sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Python Image Load By Non-Python Process
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the image load of "Python Core" by a non-Python process. This might be indicative of a Python script bundled with Py2Exe.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Patrick St. John, OTR (Open Threat Research)

mitre_attack_techniques.signature_description: The PE file contains an overlay
The PE file contains a PDB path
Checks if the current process is being debugged
Runs a DLL by calling functions
Checks if the current process is being debugged

signature_matches.name: contains PDB path
signature_matches.description: executable/pe/pdb
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: contains PDB path
    namespace: executable/pe/pdb
    authors:
      - moritz.raabe@mandiant.com
    scopes:
      static: file
      dynamic: file
    examples:
      - 464EF2CA59782CE697BC329713698CCC  # level32.exe
  features:
    - string: /:\\.*\.pdb/

signature_matches.name: static_pe_pdbpath
signature_matches.description: The PE file contains a PDB path

signature_matches.name: antidebug_setunhandledexceptionfilter
signature_matches.description: SetUnhandledExceptionFilter detected (possible anti-debug)

signature_matches.name: stealth_timeout
signature_matches.description: Possible date expiration check, exits too soon after checking local time

signature_matches.name: contains_pe_overlay
signature_matches.description: The PE file contains an overlay
match_data: Contains overlay at offset 0x0000d000 with size: 12056 bytes

signature_matches.description: Found graphical window changes (likely an installer)

signature_matches.description: PE file has an executable .text section and no other executable section
Reads software policies
Found GUI installer (many successful clicks)
Performs DNS lookups
Sample file is different than original file name gathered from version info
PE file contains a mix of data directories often seen in goodware
Classification label
Disables application error messsages (SetErrorMode)
Sample tries to load a library which is not present or installed on the analysis machine, adding the library might reveal more behavior
Runs a DLL by calling functions
Spawns processes
PE file has a high image base, often used for DLLs
Contains modern PE file flags such as dynamic base (ASLR) or NX
Tries to load missing DLLs
Creates mutexes
Creates a process in suspended mode (likely to inject code)
PE / OLE file has a valid certificate
PE file contains a valid data directory to section mapping
Binary contains paths to debug symbols
Checks if the current process is being debugged
PE file contains a debug data directory
URLs found in memory or binary data
